cloud.timo.TimoCloud.api.objects

Interface ServerObject


  • public interface ServerObject

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeCommand(java.lang.String command)
      Executes the given command as ConsoleSender on the server
      int getCurrentPlayers()
      The servers current player count can be faked by manipulating ServerListPingEvent

      An extra is a custom value users can set per API.
      GroupObject getGroup() 
      java.lang.String getGroupName()
      Use this method if you only need the groups name - it is more performant than retrieving the group object by name as getGroup() does

      java.lang.String getMap()
      If a servers map is assigned randomly, the map name will be the part of the map directories name after the '_'.

      The servers maximum player count can be faked by manipulating ServerListPingEvent

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The servers name

      • getGroup

        GroupObject getGroup()
        Returns:
        The group the server is part of

      • getGroupName

        java.lang.String getGroupName()
        Use this method if you only need the groups name - it is more performant than retrieving the group object by name as getGroup() does
        Returns:
        The name of the group the server is part of.

      • getState

        java.lang.String getState()
        Returns:
        The servers state

      • setState

        void setState(java.lang.String state)
        Sets the servers state and sends it to TimoCloud BungeeCord
        Parameters:
        state - The state, e.g. 'INGAME' or 'FULL'

      • getExtra

        java.lang.String getExtra()
        An extra is a custom value users can set per API. An example use case would be 'Teaming' or 'NoTeaming'
        Returns:
        The servers extra

      • setExtra

        void setExtra(java.lang.String extra)
        An extra is a custom value users can set per API. An example use case would be 'Teaming' or 'NoTeaming'
        Parameters:
        extra - A string containing the extra

      • getMap

        java.lang.String getMap()
        If a servers map is assigned randomly, the map name will be the part of the map directories name after the '_'. E.g. 'BedWars_VILLAGE' becomes 'VILLAGE'. If no random maps exist, the 'defaultMapName' property from config.yml will be used.
        Returns:
        The servers map name

      • getMotd

        java.lang.String getMotd()
        The servers MOTD (= message of the day) can be faked by manipulating ServerListPingEvent
        Returns:
        A string containing the MOTD

      • getCurrentPlayers

        int getCurrentPlayers()
        The servers current player count can be faked by manipulating ServerListPingEvent
        Returns:
        An integer containing the amount of players currently online

      • getMaxPlayers

        int getMaxPlayers()
        The servers maximum player count can be faked by manipulating ServerListPingEvent
        Returns:
        An integer containing the amount of maximum online players

      • getSocketAddress

        java.net.InetSocketAddress getSocketAddress()
        Returns:
        The servers IP address and port players can connect to

      • getIpAddress

        java.net.InetAddress getIpAddress()
        Returns:
        The servers IP address

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Returns:
        The servers port

      • isSortedOut

        boolean isSortedOut()
        Returns:
        Returns if the servers current state is contained in its groups sortOutStates list

      • executeCommand

        void executeCommand(java.lang.String command)
        Executes the given command as ConsoleSender on the server
        Parameters:
        command - *Without leading /*

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the server
